Class Actor

java.lang.Object
Actor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Depot, Fence, Forest, MitosisPool, MobileActor, Pad, Sign
public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object

This is an abstract class for all actors to be simulated

Created on 9/18/2020

    • collideWith

      public Actor collideWith​(java.lang.String className, java.util.ArrayList<Actor> actors)
      Detect if there are any objects of the given class exist in the actor array which has the same location of this object
      Parameters:
      className - Class that want to be detected collision
      actors - List reference of that store all actors for collision detection
      Returns:
      The first actor in the array that collide with this object and is instance of Class cls
